ArgonTest.Name: Base class field
ArgonTest.InputSource:
module _
import Argon.Core::*
open class A <: Object public new(name: String) field name = name end
field name: String
public proc self.say_hello(): () do puts 'Hello' puts name end
end
class B <: A public new(name: String) initialize _ = A.new(name) end
end
proc main(): () do let obj: A = B.new('Tree') obj.say_hello() end
